website_summaries.verdict: A striking-looking carving knife that also does a great job.
pros: Made of German steel with 8-inch blade and full tang
Ergonomic Pakka wood handle is easy to grip
cons: The knife is very sharp, but it also requires frequent sharpening

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Come with a nice presentation case. Knife is sharp, very sharp. Like most knives with a steel blades, wash by hand, rinse and dry immediately. Do not throw in the dishwasher and do air dry. If you don't, you'll end up with small rust stains, where the water droplets air-dried. BTW, I have a fairly extensive extensive collection of Wusthof Classic Creme knives. I didn't purchase the Wusthof carving knife and fork set, which sells for over $200, This set matches the Wusthof knives perfectly! Few people will know these are not Wusthof knives unless the inspect the stamped writing on the blade.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: The best carving set ever!
customer_reviews.text: This carving set is beautiful! Extremely sharp and will get them job done right. I love the beautiful ivory colored handles and the craftsmanship that went into these is so nice. They come in this nice box/case with a magnetic closer so you can store them away perfectly. I’m so glad I purchased them. I also purchased and wrote a review with pics for the 8 piece drawer knife set too and I am absolutely beyond pleased with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this carving set. It is sharp and does its job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: In control of the meat!
customer_reviews.text: We love this set, it matches the block of knives we got as a gift. The knife is sharp, both are well balanced, a real pleasure to hold.
customer_reviews.author: jog4lf

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: was a Christmas gift, was used over the holidays , could not believe how easily it cut meat !! like butter
customer_reviews.author: denden j

customer_reviews.title: Good for all meats
customer_reviews.text: Cuts cleanly through steaks and chicken breast, amazing quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Nice set! Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: I use this set for carving smoked brisket. It does a nice job and cleans easily
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Loved this set
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set! I don't see carving knives in white too often but these are great. They also are sharp and cut very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Focarazzo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality carving set, well balanced handles. Nice addition to my bigger Cangshan knife set.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: perfect match for the knife set
customer_reviews.text: this was the last item I needed to complete my knife set
customer_reviews.author: Jim Longbrake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price..
customer_reviews.text: Tis is an Excellent knife set. I bought them for my Husband for Christmas.. He used them immediately at Christmas dinner. My husband Has a set that is his all time favorite. He said the set was well balanced, cut like butter. It is now his new favorite. He place his old set in the cutlery cabinet & hasn't taken it out since. He love this set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knives
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully crafted knives. I got them for a friend as a Christmas gift and he loves them. I am also impressed by the quality of these knives at the price point. The grinds are even, the handles and tang line up seamlessly and they are very sharp. the knife block is also very well crafted. As long as he keeps the block and knives oiled with some food grade mineral oil, they should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knive
customer_reviews.text: These knives are wonderful. I purchased the carving set to go the full set of knives purchased at another place. I would highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best carving knife i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carving knife set. No more being embarrassed at holidays when brother in law wants to carve the turkey and I pull out a chef knife from 1992. May sure you pay attention and do no put this knife set in dishwasher, it will rust.
customer_reviews.author: TB32

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Item is extremely sharp as is the block knife set !!
customer_reviews.author: T-Stael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Need a good carving knife, this one is perfect. The box is great, we use it to store the knife and fork after each use. Make sure to hand wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Knives...So take care of them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am seeing several people complain about the quality of these knives...when in reality they should be complaining about the level of care that they (the end user of the knife) is giving to the knife...as with anything of quality, NEVER PUT IT IN THE DISHWASHER!!!...STOP BEING LAZY AND HANDWASH THESE KNIVES!!!! They are wonderful knives and will take great care of you and your food for as long as you take great care of them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Baird

customer_reviews.title: Matches Costco set
customer_reviews.text: Got this to match the set I got from Costco. Perfect match!
customer_reviews.author: Khristian

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knife
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good Knife set to cut the turkey for Thanksgiving this year. I also do a lot of smoking so I thought this would be great for any future cooks I do. I love this comes in a nice box that I can keep the knives in away from the family. I keep it tucked away in my drawer so the kids don’t get it and put something I shouldn’t with this knife. I Like the feel of the knife and it is super sharp. The cuts on the turkey were nice and clean. I highly recommend this knife. The fork is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sumbuddy

product_meta.title: Cangshan S1 Series 61895 German Steel Forged 2-Piece Carving Set, Creme
feature_bullets: Patent Pending Design knives that focuses on ergonomics handle that easy and comfortable grip
Full tangs are triple riveted to the handles for exceptional durability and control
Forged from X50Cr15MoV German Steel with HRC 58 +/- 2 on the Rockwell Hardness Scale
2-piece knife set includes carving knife( 9-inch blade, 5.5-inch handle) and carving fork( overall 10.85-inch)
National Sanitation Foundation(NSF) Approved, limited lifetime warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars779 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
